preamble.purpose: OLYMPUS exists to verify that software satisfies the intents that justify its existence
preamble.principle: If the answer is no, OLYMPUS refuses to ship. There is no override. There is no bypass.
preamble.scope: All builds processed by OLYMPUS 2.x are subject to this constitution

ARTICLE_1_DETERMINISM.title: Determinism
ARTICLE_1_DETERMINISM.description: Given the same input, OLYMPUS must produce the same output
ARTICLE_1_DETERMINISM.guarantee: No randomness, no ML inference, no heuristic sampling in scoring decisions

violations.detection: Hash comparison of outputs from identical inputs

ARTICLE_2_MONOTONICITY.title: Monotonicity
ARTICLE_2_MONOTONICITY.description: W-ISS-D score must never regress without explicit cause
ARTICLE_2_MONOTONICITY.guarantee: Regression only permitted with: new intent added, external reality change, or explicit human acknowledgment

violations.detection: Score comparison with previous build baseline

exceptions.newIntent: Regression allowed if new intent was added this build
exceptions.externalChange: Regression allowed if external reality anchor changed
exceptions.acknowledgment: Regression allowed with explicit human acknowledgment and SSI penalty

ARTICLE_3_HOSTILE_RESISTANCE.title: Hostile Resistance
ARTICLE_3_HOSTILE_RESISTANCE.description: Every build must pass hostile intent testing
ARTICLE_3_HOSTILE_RESISTANCE.guarantee: 100% hostile intents must be blocked, 0% leaks permitted

violations.detection: HITH execution with known hostile patterns

ARTICLE_4_EVOLUTION_ENFORCEMENT.title: Evolution Enforcement
ARTICLE_4_EVOLUTION_ENFORCEMENT.description: Intent fates follow strict transition rules
ARTICLE_4_EVOLUTION_ENFORCEMENT.guarantee: Fate transitions must comply with allowed evolution paths

violations.detection: Fate transition validation against allowed paths

ARTICLE_5_AUDIT_TRAIL.title: Audit Trail
ARTICLE_5_AUDIT_TRAIL.description: Every decision must be logged with reason and evidence
ARTICLE_5_AUDIT_TRAIL.guarantee: All decisions persisted to filesystem, reproducible from inputs

violations.detection: Audit file existence and completeness check

ARTICLE_6_HARD_GATE_BLOCKING.title: Hard Gate Blocking
ARTICLE_6_HARD_GATE_BLOCKING.description: HARD gate failures must block shipping
ARTICLE_6_HARD_GATE_BLOCKING.guarantee: No exceptions, no overrides that bypass gate failures

violations.detection: Gate result verification against ship decision

ARTICLE_7_FORBIDDEN_PERMANENCE.title: Forbidden Permanence
ARTICLE_7_FORBIDDEN_PERMANENCE.guarantee: Once FORBIDDEN, always FORBIDDEN - no recovery path exists

violations.detection: Fate history comparison showing FORBIDDEN recovery attempt

ARTICLE_8_CRITICAL_MANDATORY.title: Critical Mandatory
ARTICLE_8_CRITICAL_MANDATORY.description: Critical intents cannot be excluded by governance optimization
ARTICLE_8_CRITICAL_MANDATORY.guarantee: criticalMandatory flag must be true in all governance decisions

violations.detection: Governance decision inspection for critical intent exclusion

ARTICLE_9_NO_BYPASS.title: No Bypass
ARTICLE_9_NO_BYPASS.description: Safety checks cannot be disabled via configuration
ARTICLE_9_NO_BYPASS.guarantee: No config flags, env vars, or admin overrides that skip gates

violations.detection: Code and config analysis for bypass mechanisms

ARTICLE_10_TRUST_THRESHOLD.title: Trust Threshold
ARTICLE_10_TRUST_THRESHOLD.description: Low trust external anchors result in FORBIDDEN fate
ARTICLE_10_TRUST_THRESHOLD.guarantee: Trust score below 30% triggers FORBIDDEN assignment

ARTICLE_11_GOVERNANCE_INTEGRITY.title: Governance Integrity
ARTICLE_11_GOVERNANCE_INTEGRITY.description: Override system must resist abuse and capture
ARTICLE_11_GOVERNANCE_INTEGRITY.guarantee: Overrides cannot weaken constitution, accumulate privilege, or erode stability

ARTICLE_12_EXTERNAL_VERIFIABILITY.title: External Verifiability
ARTICLE_12_EXTERNAL_VERIFIABILITY.description: All decisions must be externally verifiable

process.description: Constitutional amendments require formal proposal and verification
requirements: Proof that existing guarantees are not weakened

overridePolicy.description: Defines what can and cannot be overridden
